page.title: 19BRAUNSTONE MARCHING BAND
page.content: The Band has been formed for nearly four years.They were previously known as the BRAUNSTONE MARCHING JAZZ BAND. All-together the Band has about 30 members and a parents commitee. Last year the Band went all out on competitions all over Britain , including places like Southampton and Warwick. After the competition season the BRAUNSTONE SUPREMES earned the title of"THE SOLIENT NOVICE CHAMPIONS"and were also the proud owners of 13 trophies. The Band also does charity events for old people and are regular favourites for carnivals and local garden fetes. The Band play various instruments ranging from trumpets,euphoniums, Bell-lyres to Drums and various other equipment used for a marching band. Writen by N.Hadley age 16.
